com.jcodeing.kmedia.assist

Class AnimationHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jcodeing.kmedia.assist.AnimationHelper

  • public final class AnimationHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    Simple Animation Helper.

    Mainly for view to provide show/hide basic animation.
